LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.opacity.title: Opacity
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.opacity.desc: The opacity of the overlay on the map, from 0 (fully transparent) to 1 (opaque).
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.filter.title: Building filter
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.filter.desc: Controls what buildings the overlay is applied to. Note that "buildings" include natural rock and similar.
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.interval.title: Update interval
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.interval.desc: The number of game ticks between updates of the overlay. A lower value will give smoother updates, but decrease performance.
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.numSteps.title: Gradient steps
LanguageData.kathanon.DamageOverlay.numSteps.desc: The number of steps in the color gradient from least to most damaged.
